label: 評定衆
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Established by Ex-Sovereigns (In) Regents (Sesshō ), Civil Dictators (Kampaku ), Legal Guardians of Manors (Honke ), Lords of Manors (Ryōshu ), etc. to assist the Supreme Administrative Council (Mandokoro) and the Supreme Court (Monchūjo) to administer the manorial (shōen) and other family affairs of these great landowners and heads of families.
